result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mariah J Keller

records.addlTxt: Status conference on November 16, 2022 at 10:15 am.

4:04 PM Defendant Mariah J Keller appeared by video.  Attorney Gerard M Werner appeared by video for Mariah J Keller.  Attorney Angelina R Scarpelli appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives their right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty plea(s) entered.  Jury calendar.
Further proceedings scheduled for November 4, 2022 at 08:29 am.
Status conference scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 10:15 am.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing and waives the statutory time period within which a preliminary hearing must be held.   Preliminary hearing is set for 09-22-22 at 3:00 p.m.    
Minutes.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Initial appearance on August 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Notice given to defendant in court on 08-22-22.

2:48 pm - Defendant Mariah J Keller in court.  Attorney Gerard M Werner appeared by video for Mariah J Keller.  Attorney Angelina R Scarpelli in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Werner was just appointed this morning.  Requests adjournment to allow time to speak to defendant.
Initial appearance scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Attorney Gerard Werner is appointed as counsel of record.  Defendant is to reimburse the county at a rate of $250.00 per month commencing 10-01-22.
Petition for Appointment of an Attorney;  Affidavit of Indigency.
records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: 2:12 pm - Prosecuting attorney Anthony A. Lambrecht in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Mariah J Keller in court.  Defendant is not eligible for public defender.  PFAC forms given to defendant.  Initial appearance is adjourned to 08-22-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br. 2.

Initial appearance on August 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
(given to deft in court)
RE:  Physical abuse of a child-intentionally cause bodily harm, on 07-18-22.

Order to Seal Probable Cause Statement.
The original document was titled: Probable cause statement /judicial determination
The original history event date is: 07-20-2022

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of physical abuse of a child.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 08-08-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br. 2.  Bail is set at $3,000.00 recognizance bond with the condition that she have no abusive or assaultive contact with I.R.K., DOB: 06-11-2005.    Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody. Court orders photos and prints at TRPD.
Minutes.
